objects.src: <svg width='1080' height='1080' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><defs><linearGradient id='bgGradient' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#0FCBCD'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#107E85'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='accentGradient' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#FFD700'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#DAA520'/></linearGradient><radialGradient id='circleGradient' cx='50%' cy='50%' r='50%' fx='50%' fy='50%'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#FFFFFF'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#F0F8FF'/></radialGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#bgGradient)'/><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='300' fill='url(#circleGradient)' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='4'/><circle cx='840' cy='400' r='120' fill='url(#accentGradient)' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='2'/><circle cx='200' cy='300' r='40' fill='#FFFFFF' opacity='0.2'/><circle cx='900' cy='800' r='30' fill='#FFFFFF' opacity='0.2'/><circle cx='300' cy='800' r='25' fill='#FFFFFF' opacity='0.2'/><path d='M0 350 Q 540 450, 1080 350' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='2' fill='none' opacity='0.3'/><path d='M0 750 Q 540 650, 1080 750' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='2' fill='none' opacity='0.3'/><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='320' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='1' stroke-dasharray='10,10' fill='none'/></svg>

product_details.name: BELLAVITA Fresh Unisex EDT - Modern Elegance in Turquoise
product_details.description:
• Luxurious 100ml/3.4 fl. oz Eau de Toilette
• Versatile unisex fragrance suitable for all occasions
• Elegant turquoise bottle with premium gold cap
• Perfect for both daytime and evening wear
• Modern and sophisticated packaging design
• Fresh, contemporary scent profile
• Premium quality fragrance by BELLAVITA
• Ideal gift choice for any gender
• Travel-friendly size
• Sleek and minimalist bottle design

banner_details:
The banner features a bold promotional layout with a gradient teal background accented by soft radial highlights and white outlined curves, adding a modern and dynamic flair. Central focus is drawn to a premium perfume bottle image centered within a white radial circle. The top portion includes a large, eye-catching headline (`heading`) in all caps white font and a smaller, elegant, serif tagline (`tagline`) in gold below it. The bottom section contains the product name (`product_name`), followed by a subheading (`subheading`) and a line describing features (`description`). The price (`price`) is displayed inside a yellow circular badge, and a yellow call-to-action button with teal text (`cta`) is placed prominently at the bottom. 

**Color Palette:**
- Teal Gradient: `#0FCBCD` to `#107E85`
- Gold Accent: `#FFD700` to `#DAA520`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
- Call-to-Action Button: `#FFD700` (background), `#107E85` (text)
product_color: The product image showcases a vibrant and refreshing color palette, ideal for an energetic and modern advertisement banner. The main body of the bottle is a brilliant teal-blue (#00B6B3), exuding freshness and vitality, perfect for conveying a unisex fragrance. The cap adds elegance with a mirrored champagne gold (#D4AF37), contrasting luxuriously against the teal. The text and branding are done in a soft metallic gold (#F5E6C8), seamlessly blending with the cap while standing out crisply against the bold background. This balance of aqua-toned vibrance and golden sophistication forms an eye-catching fusion that highlights freshness and premium quality effortlessly.
